summary: Okay, we got Avengers:Endgame trailer, but now WE NEED GoT Season 8 trailer. C’mon HBO I need it like right now. Stop teasing us...
body: Okay, we got Avengers:Endgame trailer, but now WE NEED GoT Season 8 trailer. C’mon HBO I need it like right now. Stop teasing us with the things that we already know and give us something that we don’t know, you know.

My name is Dallas. 
I am 26, Leo Sun Sagittarius Rising and Cancer Moon, INFP. Chaotic Neutral. Ambivert. I am Aroace, Autistic and have Cerebral Palsy. Slytherin, Plague Rat, Inmate W25Z,  Swiftie. Gray Jedi. My blog is Multifandom, Social Justice, Doctor Who, Harry Potter, ASOIAF, Star Wars, Star Trek, Stranger Things, Life Is Strange, Orphan Black, Carmilla, WWE, Marvel, DC, LOTR, Buffy, Hannibal, Horror, Emilie Autumn, Taylor Swift, Halsey, Lorde, and other music and whatever I post!

summary: Video of the Day: Kit Harington's Lost Blind Audition for "How to Train Your Dragon"
title: Video of the Day: Kit Harington's Lost Blind Audition for "How to Train Your Dragon"
body:
Video of the Day: Kit Harington’s Lost Blind Audition for “How to Train Your Dragon”

Jon Snow may be adept at dealing with dragons in Game of Thrones, but dragons from elsewhere seem to be above his pay grade. Just unearthed from Dreamwork’s extensive archives is this blind audition for what was the beginning of the How to Train Your Dragon trilogy.

Apparently Harington has been given bits from Game of Thrones scripts to read with “some big Hollywood star”. The director is…

View On WordPress

summary:
Uhtred Ragnason / Jon Snow parallels : 
Warriors, heros and strategists
title:
Uhtred Ragnason / Jon Snow parallels : 
Warriors, heros and strategists
body:
(Nota : I will speak here about the shows not the books)

(Plus, sorry for my english writing, it’s not my native language)


Don’ t fool yourself, a warrior who perfectly knows how swinging his sword and holding his shield isn’t stupid, only capable to use his muscles and not his brain.

They have a heart, have convictions because they pledge an oath, honesty and above all of these they are men of their word.

I rewatched lately GOT season 6 with this magic button called Fast Forward and stopped on every Stark “sibling” scenes for obvious reasons…

(Don’t judge me TY.)

And all the 3 tremendous “The Last Kingdom” seasons because right now, “Danes” is my middle name and obvious reasons are very welcome again

(Don’t judge me again, I have a thing for warriors with buns.)

And I noticed their perfect similarity in their character development : Wow !! I’m proud of my two boys, they have matured, 7 seasons for Jon, 3 for Uhtred (yes the good student is Uhtred.. #winkwink).

They became Commander of an army and of their own destiny “Destiny is All”

THEY KILLED THE BOY.

(My regards to Maester Aemon)

But especially and precisely, they became Men, always full of fierceness and cleverness but with the little thing which comes with ages : Wisdom and especially cunning.

They are honorable men but for the sake of their people and the protection of their land, they are both capable to lie.

And believe me when you observe the progression of my two heros, they perfectly know the meaning of Machiavellian

UHTRED with SKADE : (beware of spoilers)

Despite Skade’s curse upon Uhtred and the probably Uhtred’s attraction (the man who loves the love) for the evil seer he never lost his final purpose, untied the curse by killing her without blood.

He was able to hide all his real feelings (by showing only the disturbing ones to fool his team), and keep secret his plan to everybody (except Sihtric, his best spy)

(Bonus : Sihtric in action, you’re welcome)

Able to play a game, dangerous but efficient, simulate sexual attraction with Skade for protecting, sure his men, but mostly………….

TADAM ! a badass princess, the Lady of Mercia

Uhtred won and I can’t wait season 4 for seeing Aethelflaed and Uhtred love story growing.

They are a power couple, they’re Royal..


JON with DA&NER&S :

Fact : Jon slept with the Blonde

But more than all the words about a potential and epic love story between these two there is also facts :

Heart Eyes :

Harrowing farewell : 

You can find into the brilliant Jonsa fandom all what you want to confort you on The Epic and sincere love story between Jon and the Blonde

I know Game of Thrones is not as far into the plot as The Last Kingdom for truly know if Jon is fooling Daenerys or not.

But, during all Season 7, he never says a single word about his potential love for Da&n&rys, he never shows any attraction on her but sleeps with her, without prelimaries nor hitting on her.

He does this coldly without saying any single word.

As a man doing his duty

(Spot the deep breathe which comes after the hesitation and the new hesitation before knocking on Da&n&rys’s door, I don’t see a man mesmerized and disturbed by passion).

And Jon has also a princess to save and to protect, at all costs, the Lady of Winterfell


Uhtred and Jon are able to sacrifice everything to save the people they care about and this includes their life at worst their body at least, but never their soul.

When you’re a warrior and a hero,making sacrifices demand lies and sometimes betrayal. 

But never, never, underestimate a warrior, he isn’t a simple sword and a simple shield but a brilliant strategist and a commander.


Bonus :  the two princesses have red hair..

summary: I don’t think I’ll ever be over the fact that one of the best shots in the GoT episode, Battle of The Bastards, where the Bolton...
body: I don’t think I’ll ever be over the fact that one of the best shots in the GoT episode, Battle of The Bastards, where the Bolton army is bearing down on Jon wasn’t CGI, that was 70 horses charging full speed at Kit Harrington.

reblog.comment: I don’t think I’ll ever be over the fact that one of the best shots in the GoT episode, Battle of The Bastards, where the Bolton army is bearing down on Jon wasn’t CGI, that was 70 horses charging full speed at Kit Harrington.
